verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] selected a border facility near El Paso to build a tent city with 450 beds for migrant children .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] has [V: selected] [ARG1: a border facility near El Paso] [ARGM-PRP: to build a tent city with 450 beds for migrant children] .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] has selected a border facility near El Paso to [V: build] [ARG1: a tent city with 450 beds for migrant children] .
